        public Monster getMonster(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity lEntity)

        Returns:
        monster for the given entity

      • addMonster

        public boolean addMonster(Monster monster)

        Parameters:
        monster -
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successfull
